C

CellBlock - Class in cs2410.assn8.view
CellBlock for MineSweeper-like game extends Button and can be one of two different types: a bomb or normal cell
CellBlock() - Constructor for class cs2410.assn8.view.CellBlock
Constructor sets the stylesheet to determine visual aspects of the different states of the cell blocks and to set a specified size to avoid graphic issues when changing states
CellBlock(String) - Constructor for class cs2410.assn8.view.CellBlock
Constructor that receives the type of cell block and initializes the setOnMouseReleased method for each type of cell
clicked - Variable in class cs2410.assn8.view.CellBlock
boolean variable to determine whether the cell has already been clicked or not
col - Variable in class cs2410.assn8.view.CellBlock
int variables to keep track of the grid position of the cell
correctClicks - Static variable in class cs2410.assn8.control.Main
Int variable to determine how many correct clicks have been made
createArray() - Method in class cs2410.assn8.control.Main
Create an array of bombs and normal cells Shuffle the array and populate it into the grid If a current game is running, reset all variables
createNewTimer() - Static method in class cs2410.assn8.view.MineMenu
Create a new timer
